*Open [DLC] under the [Item] page in the main menu and select new items to receive them.

*Full The Legend of Heroes: Kai no Kiseki game (sold separately) required to access this content. Please update and install the most recent patch if necessary.

*This content is included in the The Legend of Heroes: Kai no Kiseki -Farewell, O Zemuria- Season Pass. Beware of duplicate purchases.
